## BaseServer.\_onInternalServerError() method

On error throwed inside (not TsrpcError) By default, it will return a "Internal server error". If `returnInnerError` is `true`<!-- -->, an `innerError` field would be returned.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
_onInternalServerError(err: {
        message: string;
        stack?: string;
        name?: string;
    }, call: ApiCall): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  err | { message: string; stack?: string; name?: string; } |  |
|  call | [ApiCall](./tsrpc.apicall.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
